name: auth_rls_initplan
title: Auth RLS Initialization Plan
description: Detects if calls to \`current_setting()\` and \`auth.<function>()\` in RLS policies are being unnecessarily re-evaluated for each row
detail: Table \`public.player\` has a row level security policy \`player_no_delete\` that re-evaluates current_setting() or auth.<function>() for each row. This produces suboptimal query performance at scale. Resolve the issue by replacing \`auth.<function>()\` with \`(select auth.<function>())\`. See [docs](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/postgres/row-level-security#call-functions-with-select) for more info.

name: duplicate_index
title: Duplicate Index
description: Detects cases where two ore more identical indexes exist.
detail: Table \`public.loyalty_ledger\` has identical indexes {loyalty_ledger_idempotency_uk,ux_loyalty_ledger_idem}. Drop all except one of them
